title: Paracas, Huacachina and Sunset Tour at the Oasis
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure along the southern coast of Peru with this tour that combines nature, adrenaline and culture. Visit the Ballestas Islands, the oasis of Huacachina and the Cultur Pisco winery in one day. An unmissable experience!
all_descriptions: Embark on an unforgettable adventure along the southern coast of Peru with this tour that combines nature, adrenaline and culture. Visit the Ballestas Islands, the oasis of Huacachina and the Cultur Pisco winery in one day. An unmissable experience!

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Miraflores District, Lima Peru04:00 a.m. ‚Äì Meeting point at Ibis Larco Miraflores

We start our adventure from the meeting point at Ibis Larco Miraflores (Av. Jos√© Larco 1140, Miraflores) at 4:00 a.m. Our guide and transportation will be waiting outside the hotel. The exact time will be confirmed a day early. It is recommended to arrive 5 minutes in advance; the maximum waiting time is 5 minutes.Duration: 1 hourStop At:Paracas, Paracas, Ica Region08:00 a.m. ‚Äì Lima to Paracas (approximately 3 hours journey)

We will arrive at the port of Paracas at 8:00 a.m. and we will have between 30 and 40 minutes to have breakfast and use the hygienic services (breakfast is not included in the price).

09:15 a.m. ‚Äì Paracas: check-in at El Chaco port (approximately 20 minutes)

At 9:00 a.m. we will start forming the line to board our modern boats. Due to logistical issues at the port, we may have to wait 10 to 20 minutes before boarding. Therefore, we recommend wearing sunscreen, sun hat or cap and a waterproof jacket.Duration: 3 hoursStop At:Islas Ballestas, Paracas 11660 Peru09:30 AM: Ballestas Islands (approximately 1 hour and 30 minutes)

The Ballestas Islands are a group of islands located off the coast of Peru, known for their impressive marine life and birdlife. Your meta description could be something like
Discover the natural beauty of the Ballestas Islands: a paradise of marine life on the Peruvian coast. Explore its waters full of marine fauna, observe exotic birds in their natural habitat and immerse yourself in the richness of marine biodiversity. A unique experience for nature and adventure lovers!Duration: 1 hourStop At:Ica, Ica, Ica Region12:00 pm ‚Äì Paracas to Ica (approximately 1 hour bus ride)

Continuing our tour, we will arrive in Ica around 1:00 p.m. and head to the Cultur Pisco Winery.Duration: 1 hourStop At:Culturpisco, Fundo El Arrabal Cas. Arrabales S/n Fundo Santa Catalina, Ica 11004 Peru12:30 p.m. ‚Äì We will arrive at the Cultur Pisco winery, where we will enjoy a guided tour with tasting of piscos and artisan wines. In addition, we will have free time for lunch on our own in the local restaurant, which offers a variety of typical dishes of the region. (Lunch not included in the tour price).Duration: 3 hoursStop At:Huacachina, Huacachina, Ica Region15:30 hrs ‚Äì Arrival at Huacachina Oasis ‚Äì Free time
When you arrive at the Huacachina Oasis, you will have approximately 40 minutes to explore and enjoy this beautiful place. Huacachina is an emblematic destination of the Ica Desert, known for its lagoon surrounded by high sand dunes.

16:30 ‚Äì Huacachina Oasis: Buggies and Sandboard (duration approximately: 2 hours)
To close this adventure with a golden pin, we will enjoy the most exciting activity: a buggie ride through the desert dunes, driven by experienced drivers, and Sandboarding practice. Both activities last approximately 1 hour, leaving additional time to admire the landscape or relax in the oasis.Duration: 3 hoursStop At:Lima, Lima, Lima Region18:30 hrs ‚Äì Ica to Lima
Departure to Lima with estimated arrival between 10:30 p.m. and 12:00 a.m.

Important:
The tour includes exclusive transportation for our passengers, with a small bag (max. 10 kg) per person. If you're carrying more luggage, you can add a large suitcase for $30.

Recommendation:
If you have a flight near midnight, we suggest hiring a private tour to ensure your arrival at the airport on time.Duration: 4 hours

ibis Lima Larco Miraflores, Av. Jos√© Larco 1140, Miraflores 15074, PeruThe meeting point is outside the Hotel Ibis Larco Miraflores. The time is confirmed a day earlier. Be punctual, the tolerance is 5 minutes. We also offer pick-up from your hotel for an additional cost.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

Excellent and highly recommended

Sep 2025 ‚Ä¢ Couples
We did the Paracas-Huacachina tour with Inca Trilogy Tours and it was an amazing experience from start to finish. From the attention by message and in office to the organization of the tour, everything was excellent. Our guide Dave was always watching the group, providing clear information and making the tour very enjoyable. Lunch and pisco tasting in the restaurant were delicious, with super attentive staff. The desert walk was very well organized and the price of the tour is totally worth it. Highly recommended 100%, especially with Dave as guide.

A recommended combo of navigation and buggi x ols medanos.

Sep 2025 ‚Ä¢ Friends

A day packed with adventure and beauty

Sep 2025 ‚Ä¢ Solo
I'm from South Australia
This day was beyond my expectations, it had it all!
Early start to the day, comfortable bus with USB charging and air-conditioning.
Included history, nature, sightseeing, excitement and adventure . With a great tour guide Davi, everyone spoke Spanish, but not me.
Davi made me feel comfortable and safe in a foreign country. I recommend this tour if you have time in Lima
